languages.text: "Вигдис, я скоро сойду с ума от скуки. На вашем стрельбище недостаточно мишеней, и они слишком быстро приходят в негодность! Есть ли новости от Вольного Торговца? Жду не дождусь, когда мы сможем отправиться в путь!"

"Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"
languages.original_text: "Вигдис, я скоро сойду с ума от скуки. На вашем стрельбище недостаточно мишеней, и они слишком быстро приходят в негодность! Есть ли новости от Вольного Торговца? Жду не дождусь, когда мы сможем отправиться в путь!"

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, the boredom will soon drive me insane. There a not enough targets in your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Are there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait until we get on the road again!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, the boredom will soon drive me insane. There a not enough targets in your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Are there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait until we get on the road again!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vigdis, je vous informe que si ça continue, je vais littéralement mourir d'ennui. Votre petit stand de tir n'a pas assez de cibles et elles sont beaucoup trop fragiles ! Avez-vous des nouvelles {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ? J'ai hâte de quitter cet endroit ! »
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"

traits.locale_text: « Vigdis, je vous informe que si ça continue, je vais littéralement mourir d'ennui. Votre petit stand de tir n'a pas assez de cibles et elles sont beaucoup trop fragiles ! Avez-vous des nouvelles {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ? J'ai hâte de quitter cet endroit ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Vigdis, diese Langeweile treibt mich bald noch in den Wahnsinn. Ihr habt auf Eurem Schießstand nicht genügend Ziele, und sie halten nicht lang genug! Gibt es Neuigkeiten {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin}? Ich kann es nicht erwarten, endlich weiterzureisen!"
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, diese Langeweile treibt mich bald noch in den Wahnsinn. Ihr habt auf Eurem Schießstand nicht genügend Ziele, und sie halten nicht lang genug! Gibt es Neuigkeiten {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin}? Ich kann es nicht erwarten, endlich weiterzureisen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Vigdis, este aburrimiento me está matando. ¡No hay suficientes objetivos a la vista, y desaparecen demasiado rápido! ¿Sabe algo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente? ¡Me gustaría arrancar de inmediato!».
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"

traits.locale_text: «Vigdis, este aburrimiento me está matando. ¡No hay suficientes objetivos a la vista, y desaparecen demasiado rápido! ¿Sabe algo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente? ¡Me gustaría arrancar de inmediato!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “维格迪斯，这实在是太无聊了，快把我逼疯了。靶场里的靶子根本不够，而且很快就打坏了！有没有行商浪人的消息？我已经迫不及待地想再次上路了！”
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"

traits.locale_text: “维格迪斯，这实在是太无聊了，快把我逼疯了。靶场里的靶子根本不够，而且很快就打坏了！有没有行商浪人的消息？我已经迫不及待地想再次上路了！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴィグディス、これほど暇だと、そのうち頭がおかしくなる。射程範囲には満足に敵もいないし、あっという間に始末してしまう！自由開拓者から何か知らせはないのか？晴れて再び出発できるときが待ち遠しいぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィグディス、これほど暇だと、そのうち頭がおかしくなる。射程範囲には満足に敵もいないし、あっという間に始末してしまう！自由開拓者から何か知らせはないのか？晴れて再び出発できるときが待ち遠しいぞ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Vigdis, bu can sıkıntısı yakında beni delirtecek. Atış poligonunda yeterince hedef yok ve çok hızlı parçalanıyorlar! Hür Tacir'den haber yok mu? Yola çıkmak için artık iyice sabırsızlanıyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, this boredom will soon drive me insane. There are not enough targets at your shooting range, and they wear out too quickly! Is there any news from the Rogue Trader? I cannot wait to finally get on our way again!"
